text: Up from the Beach is a 1965 American French World War II movie directed by Robert Parrish and based on the 1959 novel Epitaph for an Enemy by George Barr. It stars Cliff Robertson, Red Buttons, James Robertson Justice, Broderick Crawford, Robert Hoffman, Marius Goring and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1965 war movies Category:1965 drama movies Category:American war movies Category:French movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Parrish
title: Up from the Beach
